title: Albert_Ibragimov
author: Albert_Ibragimov
content: The official branch of Djan GEMS License | Token DJG smart contract as an offer agreementOfficial website gems-terra.proA license for GEMS software products can be purchased for the Djan GEMS token. The DjG ERC20 token on the Ethereum blockchain smart contract is used as an agreement of the offer agreement between the licensee and the licensor. With the help of a license, a person will be able to use paid versions of GEMS software products. By purchasing a token, a person signs an offer agreement.telegram https://t.me/gems_community
